context.content: "Speed" is a 1994 action thriller film directed by Jan de Bont. The plot revolves around a young police officer who must prevent a bomb from exploding on a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph. The main characters are played by Keanu Reeves, who portrays the police officer, and Sandra Bullock, who plays a passenger on the bus.
